quotes.quote: The smaller the mind the greater the conceit.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: When they discover the center of the universe, a lot of people will be disappointed to discover they are not it.
quotes.author: Bernard Bailey

quotes.quote: Conceit is God's gift to little men.
quotes.author: Bruce Barton

quotes.quote: What is the first business of one who practices philosophy? To get rid of self-conceit. For it is impossible for anyone to begin to learn that which he thinks he already knows.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The world tolerates conceit from those who are successful, but not from anybody else.
quotes.author: John Blake

quotes.quote: An ostentatious man will rather relate a blunder or an absurdity he has committed, than be debarred from talking of his own dear person.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: We are so vain that we even care for the opinion of those we don't care for.
quotes.author: Marie Ebner von Eschenbach

quotes.quote:
For God hates utterly
The bray of bragging tongues.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: The greatest of faults, I should say, is to be conscious of none.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle
